text:
Podar Education Network is a network of private, co-educational schools in India. It is managed by the Podar Education Trust, with its head office in Mumbai. The organisation has over 110 schools across India, making it one of the largest private education networks in India.
The network has been preparing students for the Central Board for Secondary Education (CBSE), Council for Indian School Certificate Examinations (ICSE), Secondary School Certificate (SSC), IGCSE and International Baccalaureate (IB) examinations across the country.
